tool_name: Premier League Player and Club Statistics
tool_description: Player and Club Statistics like the top 10 in different categories from the Premier League, the data is updated as it is updated on the Premier League official website.
title: Premier League Player and Club Statistics

api_list.name: Club Stats Categories
api_list.description: Get different categories for player stats.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://premier-league-player-and-club-statistics.p.rapidapi.com/category/clubs"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "premier-league-player-and-club-statistics.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Clubs Stats
api_list.description: Get the statistics and ranking of clubs in a category.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://premier-league-player-and-club-statistics.p.rapidapi.com/stats/top/clubs/{category}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "premier-league-player-and-club-statistics.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Player Stats
